author: Larry Schwemle
comment: Best customizable available. Thanks for the awesome work

author: Jorge díaz
comment: It doesn't work on my huawei watch with Android 2.0. (huawei mate 8 with android 6.0).  It just doesn't appear.

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content: Try to restart your watch and a phone.

author: Michał Ulaski
comment: Nie wiem czy to kwestia jakichś ustawień u mnie (wyłączyłem nawet widgety​) ale strasznie zużywa baterię telefonu

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content: Niestety z baterią jest słabo. Postaram się to w przyszłości poprawić.

author: Dave Krusch
comment: Nice watch - very clear and readable.  The weather is inconsistent and the F display has two decimal places - looks unusual.  Can you adjust?   Thanks

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content: Hi. Thx for info about temperature. How it should be done correctly? Always only 1 digit after dot? Write me please at ramzes@ramzes.design. This issue will be corrected in nearest update.

author: Michael Sacco
comment: Looking forward to full preset importing/exporting to share configurations.  This is a great looking watch face and a very well put together customizer app

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content:
Importing is done and will be available in GP very soon. 
Exporting - maybe in the future.

author: Brian Parker
comment: Nice, clean and very easy to read.   Runs great on my Huawei Watch(AW2.0 preview) and LG Watch Sport. Very customizable and one of my new favorites.

author: Jerry B
comment: Great watchface, seconds would make this perfect for me

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content: I'll try to add seconds as a widget.

author: Nicholas Piccone
comment: Another great watchface from RAMZES.design. lots of customizations available, battery friendly; I can get 2 days with my 1st gen Huawei. The bitmap option for backgrounds is a nice option to have.

author: Bradley Larcher
comment: My favorite watch face so far. Not only does it look good but can be customized too

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content: I'm glad you like it. Thx!

author: Steve Meder
comment: Love this watch face. The only thing that would make it perfect is if one of the widgets was heart rate.

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content: OK, I'll add this to my TODO list. Stay tuned.

author: Nik Brooks
comment: Awesome watch face with lots of customisations and it is so clean and looks amazing on my LG Urbane 2nd edition.... Probably the best watch face I have ever used. Excellent developer support.

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content: Thank you my friend. I'm happy you like it.
